name: Devour-O-Saur
description:
Small game made in 48hrs for JimJam2.

The Devour-O-Saur eats zombies to stay alive, make it through the level by eating enough zombies allong the way. Eat even more zombies to level up and become faster.

Made with existing assets, coding and UI by myself.
Readme.txt file with used assets and their origin included in the download.
